name: Tractor Beam
note: You can move a target even if you can't see it. The target ends up in a place where you can see and damage it. The moves do not have to be in the same direction.

firstEffect.name: Basic mode
firstEffect.description: Move a target 0, 1, or 2 squares to a square you can see, and give it 1 damage.

secondEffect.name: Punisher mode
secondEffect.description: Choose a target 0, 1, or 2 moves away from you. Move the target to your square and deal 3 damage to it.
